name: Wikipedia Anniversaries
author: Piotr Pesta

sections.description:
Wikipedia Anniversaries is a widget that lets your visitors to see important history dates from Wikipedia. Supported languages so far: Deutsch, Polish, English and Persian. More languages in the future. To customize style just edit style-wiki-this-day.css file. Cache support – 5 hours refresh rate.

If you would like to show your support for this software, please consider donating: Donate via PayPal.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zip to ‘plugins’ directory
  2. Unzip (steps 1 and 2 cand also be performed automatically)
  3. Activate the plugin
  4. Configure and place the widget on your sidebar

Or just add .zip file as a new plugin in your WordPress administration panel.

1.1.5

  • Local time support (english lang only)

1.1.0

  • Bugfix – widget works again

1.0.2

  • Persian language support

1.0.1

  • Minor bug fixed (in PL lang)

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
